Captivating story of two brothers, one good, one bad. The good one becomes a lawyer while the bad one resorts to crime and ultimately...

sources.title: It Could Happen to You (1937) DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Alan Baxter, Owen Davis Jr. , Andrea Leeds
Director: Phil Rosen
Writers: Nathanael West, Samuel Ornitz

Captivating family drama of two brothers, one becomes a lawyer while the other struggles and ultimately resorts to a crime that will alter their lives forever. Screenplay co-written by Nathaniel West, author of the anti-Hollywood novel Day of the Locust, and Samuel Ornitz, one the Hollywood Ten.
